alert.note: Alert for Clay; Jackson; Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 2:26PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Wyandotte, northeastern Johnson, southwestern Clay, southeastern Platte and northwestern Jackson Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 225 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lenexa, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Overland Park, Olathe, Independence, Shawnee, Lenexa, Leawood, Gladstone, Prairie Village, Merriam, Mission, North Kansas City, Fairway, Mission Hills, Sugar Creek, Riverside, Westwood, Lake Quivira, Kansas City Kansas and Avondale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 0 and 7. Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 417 and 423. Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 0 and 11. Interstate 35 in Kansas between mile markers 221 and 235. Interstate 29 between mile markers 0 and 4. Interstate 635 between mile markers 0 and 12. Interstate 435 between mile markers 0 and 6, between mile markers 53 and 60, and between mile markers 77 and 83. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
